
```{r, warning=FALSE,  message=FALSE,}
prices_close <- prices$mean_close

prices_ts <- ts(prices_close, start = c(2017, 08, 17, 04, 00, 00), frequency = 8760) # 24h * 365 dni : a co z efektem kalendarzowym

summary(prices_ts)
plot(prices_ts)
```
